page.title: 18EVENTS IN SOUTH MARSTON
page.content: Discos, Cherry feast, School and Church Fete, Rainbow Room, Path Finder's, Sunday School, Bible Study, Coffee morning, diet, Sponsored Walks, concerts, Beer Giving. The{Rainbow Room}is a twice weekly summer holiday activity in the playing field. The{Cherry Feast}is held in July at the Carpenters Arms, at the Cherry Feast you can buy cherries and drink and sometimes there is a band. {School and Church fetes}happen every year. They have them on Saturday and they also have a band. They also have ten pence stalls and a cake stall etc. {Discos,the Youth Club}and{Play School happen in the village hall. There is a {Gardening Club. The School}produces a nativity play and concerts each year.
